New Members

Welcome to the New Educational Resource Center. You'll find a more unified experience with easy to follow tracks. If you're new here, start with the "Getting Started" track to begin your journey of discovery and holistic wellness.

Current Members

We've made it even easier to get your certification. Instead of taking countless quizzes at the end of each lesson, we've created end of track exams for each track that will test your knowledge and practice of Bionetic science and wellness.

Education Tracks

Think of tracks as you would a college degree. For example, The Intro to Bionetics track combines a collection of courses. Within each course are of course (pun intended) lessons. Completion of each track exam will grant you certification for that track.

Basic Principles of Homotoxicology

Homotoxicology is the study of the organization and relationships of the body’s natural defense and repair mechanisms in response to toxic substances. Dr. Reckeweg, the developer of the science of Homotoxicology, recognized a certain “biological expedience” in the progression of disease processes, and coined the term “homotoxin” (meaning “poison to humans”). Introduction to stressors and sensitivities

Medically speaking, sensitivity must be defined and verified diagnostically.
